H0.text: Acid is the term for a solution with a pH lower than 7.

H1.text: Basic is a solution with a pH lower than 7.

H2.text: Neutral is the term used to describe a solution with a pH lower than 7.

H3.text: Dioxide is a solution with a pH lower than 7.

A4.text: When an acid is dissolved in water, the pH will be less than 7.

A5.text: a base, or alkali, will have a pH greater than 7.
